actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to deny any deduction for expenses of attending business conventions outside the United States.

summary.text: Revises the Internal Revenue Code to disallow any deduction from gross income of traveling expenses for attending a business convention outside the United States by any individual who lives inside the United States.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to deny any deduction for expenses of attending business conventions outside the United States.
